item.title: Mobile in the Purchase Journey - Think with Google
item.description:
Mobile in the Purchase Journey - Think with Google

What is the role of the smartphone in the consumer journey? Explore the data anyway you like through this interactive tool.

item.title: New Data Shows Online Video Ads Drive Consideration, Favorability, Purchase Intent, and Sales
item.description:
New Data Shows Online Video Ads Drive Consideration, Favorability, Purchase Intent, and Sales

Online video can be much more than an awareness driver. New research shows that YouTube not only drives brand metrics throughout the consumer journey-from consideration and favorability to purchase intent-but also boosts potential for positive return on ad spend compared to TV.

item.title: How YouTube Extends the Reach and Engagement of Your Video Advertising
item.description:
How YouTube Extends the Reach and Engagement of Your Video Advertising

What if you could increase the millennial audience your video ads reach by 42%? Multiply engagement by 10X? How about boosting views of past videos by 500%? And what if you could do it all by rethinking YouTube's role in your media plan? Check out our latest research to find out how.

item.title: Google Shopping Insights
item.description:
Google Shopping Insights

Explore trends and the popularity of products across the U.S.

item.title: How to Identify the Right KPIs for Online Video: Lessons From Google BrandLab
item.description:
How to Identify the Right KPIs for Online Video: Lessons From Google BrandLab

When it comes to measuring a video ad's success, views aren't everything. Kim Larson, who works with hundreds of brands each year as the global head of BrandLab, shares her four-step method for getting to the right key performance indicators (KPIs). At Google BrandLab, we've run more than 400 workshops from San Bruno to Singapore.

item.title: Australian YouTube Ads Leaderboard: Year-End 2015
item.description:
Australian YouTube Ads Leaderboard: Year-End 2015

The Australian YouTube Ads Leaderboard for 2015 highlights the best ads on YouTube, and showcases advertising excellence and creative innovation.

item.title: How Demographics and Storytelling Style Affect Video Ad Effectiveness
item.description:
How Demographics and Storytelling Style Affect Video Ad Effectiveness

An ad is an ad is an ad. Or is it? Millennials have grown up with a media diet far different than the generations that came before them. Has that changed their media taste? Do brands need different types of ads to reach people of different ages?

item.title: Why Customer Analytics Are the Key to Creating Value
item.description:
Why Customer Analytics Are the Key to Creating Value

Harvard Business Review shows how companies are successfully integrating consumer and marketing data.
